subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Lou Williams scored 23 points off the bench as the Philadelphia 76ers built an early lead and held on to send the Charlotte Bobcats to their 15th straight loss, 98-89, Monday night.
snippet: Lou Williams scored 23 points off the bench as the Philadelphia 76ers built an early lead and held on to send the Charlotte Bobcats to their 15th straight loss, 98-89, Monday night.
